sig_local.h
1 /*
2  * sig_local.h
3  *
4  * Created on: Jan 12, 2012
5  * Author: tgil
6  */
7 
8 #ifndef SIG_LOCAL_H_
9 #define SIG_LOCAL_H_
10 
11 #include <hwpl.h>
12 #include <stdint.h>
13 #include <sys/reent.h>
14 
15 
16 #define SCOPE_PROCESS 0
17 #define SCOPE_THREAD 1
18 
19 
20 void signal_handler(int tid, int si_signo, int si_sigcode_si_tid, union sigval sig_value);
21 int signal_send(int tid, int si_signo, int si_sigcode, int sig_value);
22 int signal_priv_send(int send_tid,
23  int tid,
24  int si_signo,
25  int si_sigcode,
26  int sig_value,
27  int forward //this must be non-zero unless si_signo == SIGKILL
28  ) HWPL_WEAK HWPL_PRIV_CODE;
29 void signal_priv_activate(int * thread) HWPL_PRIV_EXEC_CODE;
30 void signal_priv_wait(void * args) HWPL_PRIV_EXEC_CODE;
31 
32 
33 //this is set if the signal received executes a user defined function
34 #define _PROC_FLAG_SIGEXEC 2
35 
36 #define SIGCAUGHT_ASSERTED() (_GLOBAL_REENT->procmem_base->flags & (1<<_PROC_FLAG_SIGCAUGHT))
37 #define SIGCAUGHT_ASSERT() (_GLOBAL_REENT->procmem_base->flags |= (1<<_PROC_FLAG_SIGCAUGHT))
38 #define SIGCAUGHT_DEASSERT() (_GLOBAL_REENT->procmem_base->flags &= ~(1<<_PROC_FLAG_SIGCAUGHT))
39 
40 #define SIGCHLD_ASSERTED() (_GLOBAL_REENT->procmem_base->flags & (1<<_PROC_FLAG_SIGCHLD))
41 #define SIGCHLD_ASSERT() (_GLOBAL_REENT->procmem_base->flags |= (1<<_PROC_FLAG_SIGCHLD))
42 #define SIGCHLD_DEASSERT() (_GLOBAL_REENT->procmem_base->flags &= ~(1<<_PROC_FLAG_SIGCHLD))
43 
44 #define SIGEXEC_ASSERTED() (_GLOBAL_REENT->procmem_base->flags & (1<<_PROC_FLAG_SIGCHLD))
45 #define SIGEXEC_ASSERT() (_GLOBAL_REENT->procmem_base->flags |= (1<<_PROC_FLAG_SIGCHLD))
46 #define SIGEXEC_DEASSERT() (_GLOBAL_REENT->procmem_base->flags &= ~(1<<_PROC_FLAG_SIGCHLD))
47 
48 #define THREAD_SIGMASK (_REENT->sigmask)
49 #define THREAD_SIGPENDING (_REENT->sigpending)
50 #define GLOBAL_SIGINFOS (_GLOBAL_REENT->procmem_base->siginfos)
51 #define GLOBAL_SIGINFO(signo) (((siginfo_t*)(_GLOBAL_REENT->procmem_base->siginfos))[signo])
52 #define GLOBAL_SIGACTIONS (_GLOBAL_REENT->procmem_base->sigactions)
53 #define GLOBAL_SIGACTION(signo) (_GLOBAL_REENT->procmem_base->sigactions[signo])
54 
55 #endif /* SIG_LOCAL_H_ */
